> I just installed JUnit and am unable to get the "AllTests" class to 
> run.  I have updated the classpath to include junit.jar.  When I 
> enter the following:
>
> D:\junit3_7\junit\samples>junit\samples>java junit.textui.TestRunner 
> AllTests
> 
> I get the following response:
> 
> Class not found "AllTests"
> 
> I am in the directory where AllTests.class is actually at, so I 
> don't understand what the problem is.

Does your CLASSPATH include that directory? You can be in the directory all 
you want, but if your CLASSPATH can't see it, you might as well be on 
Pluto. :)
